content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, glad to meet you. I'm always confident in my ability to negotiate. So, how much are you willing to pay for this luxurious, newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center? Remember, it's close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, mister Schmidt. I would like to rent the apartment for 450 euros per month. It is a fair price for an apartment of this size in the city center.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam, but I must admit, I was expecting a higher amount. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I think 450 euros is too low. Why don't we aim higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, mister Schmidt. I understand your point. How about we settle on 480 euros per month? It is a reasonable price for an apartment of this size in the city center.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your willingness to increase the price. However, I must insist that this apartment is worth more. The city center location, the proximity to all important facilities, it all adds up to a higher price. Why don't we aim for something closer to 550 euros per month? It's a fair price for such a luxurious apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, mister Schmidt. I can see your point. However, 550 euros per month is too high for me. I am a student, and this price is not within my budget. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think 480 euros per month is a fair price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I understand your situation. However, as a landlord, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. 480 euros per month is too low for this luxurious apartment in the city center. I apologize, but I cannot accept such a low price. 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too low for this luxurious apartment in the city center.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and consideration. I wish you the best in finding a suitable tenant for your apartment. 'TERMINATE'
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
